title: Looking for ADC duo.
body:
I have a week left to play league (going on vacation) and I want to spend it raising my preseason rank.

I'm plat V (s6) and got placed in gold. IDC what rank you are just don't be a bronze V vayne main. 

I play {{champion:267}} {{champion:40}} {{champion:25}} {{champion:12}}

IGN: TRUMP 2016

replies.body:
i whill play whith umaan. I amm bronzee v yasuoo main but i swear its alwayys my teans :( {{item:3070}}  iw ill play yasuooo adc for u i am rlly good trust me :) i suld be challenjor bye now i promize :) my namme is xXxYasuoGodxXx









This is just a joke by the way,
I'm a silver adc main, always willing to play. I play {{champion:222}} {{champion:51}} {{champion:202}} {{champion:21}} {{champion:429}}  :)
Im also keen to play, will be playing everyday for the next month between 8:30am and 5pm
Add me man i am keen i play{{champion:22}} {{champion:81}} {{champion:236}} {{champion:21}} {{champion:18}} {{champion:29}} {{champion:67}} {{champion:110}}
